## ButtonFlyoutInflater class

Class responsible for creating buttons for flyouts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ButtonFlyoutInflater implements IFlyoutInflater 
```
**Implements:** [IFlyoutInflater](./blockly.iflyoutinflater_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disposeItem(item)](./blockly.buttonflyoutinflater_class.disposeitem_1_method.md) |  | Disposes of the given button. |
|  [gapForItem(state, defaultGap)](./blockly.buttonflyoutinflater_class.gapforitem_1_method.md) |  | Returns the amount of space that should follow this button. |
|  [getType()](./blockly.buttonflyoutinflater_class.gettype_1_method.md) |  | Returns the type of items this inflater is responsible for creating. |
|  [load(state, flyout)](./blockly.buttonflyoutinflater_class.load_1_method.md) |  | Inflates a flyout button from the given state and adds it to the flyout. |
